title: The Hobbit All-in-One
description:
I know a lot of purists didn't like Peter Jackson's take on the Hobbit. It strayed further from the source material than they were comfortable, he split the story into 3, when the book more naturally divided into 2, and where did that albino orc come from?

Nonetheless, they were some smashing movies that led naturally into one another and told a coherent story. So I took all three films and edited them into a single 5-and-a-half hour movie.

If you like this kind of thing, I did the same for Peter Jackson's Lord of the Rings Trilogy here: 
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/13813408/Lord_of_the_Rings_Complete_[Extended_Edition]_DVDRIP

And with the Back to the Future trilogy here: 
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11281467/Back_to_the_Future_-_The_Movie

and with the Star Trek 2-3-4 series here: 
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11672069/Star_Trek_-_The_Genesis_Affair

Enjoy!
